resources.string: Need Charge keeps your phone charged, no matter where you are
Choose from a large number of charging stations throughout Australia
Before you head to a place, you can check itâ€™s opening hours, get directions, and see available amenities
Just scan the QR code using your camera or enter it manually to get a power bank and start charging your phone.
Connect the power bank to your phone, have fun and always keep connected with Need Charge
